item.title: VMware extends the hybrid cloud with Amazon Web Services (AWS)
item.description: VMware and Amazon Web Services (AWS) will partnering together to bring a new a VMware vSphere-based service, running on the AWS Cloud, that will make it easier and faster to run applications, across a hybrid cloud environment. It’s called the “VMware Cloud on AWS”. The infrastructure looks like: The VMware Cloud on AWS includes the following components: vCenter.Â The environment is managed by a vCenter that is running in the cloud or on-premises.
